casebody.data:
Second Department,

November, 1955.

(November 7, 1955.) Irving Gross, Individually and on Behalf of East Coast Lumber Terminal, Inc., and the Directors and Stockholders of Said Corporation and of All Stockholders Thereof Similarly Situated, Appellant-Respondent, v. Virgil M. Price, Individually and as President, Director and Stockholder of East Coast Lumber Terminal, Inc., et al., Respondents-Appellants.

Present — Nolan, P. J., Wenzel, Beldoek, Murphy and Ughetta, JJ. Motion for limited reargument denied, with $10 costs. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals and for other relief denied, without costs. Present — Wenzel, Acting P. J., Schmidt, Beldoek, Murphy and Ughetta, JJ. [See ante, p. 1031.]
